titleStmt.title: The rudiments of grammar. The rules composed in English verse, for the greater benefit and delight of young beginners. / By James Shirley.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock for R. Lownds, and are to be sold at his shop at the white Lyon in Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
